LAW , section CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) of LAW ( oikeudenkäymiskaari , rättegångsbalken , as in force at the relevant time ; DATE ) provided that a court of first instance may not use as evidence written affidavits , submitted for the purposes of pending or incoming proceedings , unless this is specifically provided for in the law or authorised by the court . CARDINAL . ORG issued a precedent on DATE concerning ORG obligation to communicate to the parties a statement invited on ORG own motion ( ORG ) . Paragraph CARDINAL of the decision reads as follows :
